document_data.name: Aragath
document_data.mainbody: '''Aragath''' was an [[Evereskan tomb guardian|Tomb Guardian]] that lived in and fought for [[Evereska]] as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He served in the unit of the Tomb Guard led by [[Galaeron Nihmedu]].
document_data.History: Aragath was among the guardians that investigated a band of tomb robbers that infiltrated a burial chamber of [[House Vyshaan]] in the [[Border Desert South]] on [[Nightal 20]] in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}. He was killed that day when the ''[[disintegrate|disintegrating]]'' eye beam of the [[beholder]] [[Shatever]], an ally of the tomb robbers, tore through his chest.
